# Configuration options

These are default settings that can be controlled with `options()`. Set the desired options in your .Rprofile. Do not set these options in production code; none of these options control behavior in non-interactive R sessions.

## `utilscognigen_cd_focus`

This option controls whether `cd()` shows the working directory in the RStudio Files pane.

## `utilscognigen_rcb_as_job`

This option controls whether `rcb()` tries to execute the programs as an RStudio Job.
